body_html:
@asimshankar I reverted the protobuf version but left in the variables so it will be easier to change version as necessary.

@stonebig the patch files are above. Hopefully the libs will be fixed soon so the patches won't be necessary.

For the untested version of protobuf that I used, but it seems to work on windows, change to the following, and add patch_file=PROTOBUF_patch_file to the 3 libraries in workspace.bzl.

    PROTOBUF_urls =[
 "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/google/protobuf/archive/ab09b2a2e203b204e11ac64750e62b3f1da7dc6e.tar.gz",
    "https://github.com/google/protobuf/archive/ab09b2a2e203b204e11ac64750e62b3f1da7dc6e.tar.gz",
    ]
    PROTOBUF_sha256 = "4a1d4dc12fe2e3621233cfeaf6baf9e47f6e184e1171f7f0c9c126942a22e31b"
    PROTOBUF_strip_prefix = "protobuf-ab09b2a2e203b204e11ac64750e62b3f1da7dc6e"
    PROTOBUF_patch_file = "//tensorflow:protobuf-patch.txt"

For eigen patch, same thing. Download the file and add it as a patch_file= to the eigen library in workspace.bzl.

body:
@asimshankar I reverted the protobuf version but left in the variables so it will be easier to change version as necessary.

@stonebig the patch files are above. Hopefully the libs will be fixed soon so the patches won't be necessary.

For the untested version of protobuf that I used, but it seems to work on windows, change to the following, and add `patch_file=PROTOBUF_patch_file` to the 3 libraries in workspace.bzl.

```
    PROTOBUF_urls =[
 "https://mirror.bazel.build/github.com/google/protobuf/archive/ab09b2a2e203b204e11ac64750e62b3f1da7dc6e.tar.gz",
    "https://github.com/google/protobuf/archive/ab09b2a2e203b204e11ac64750e62b3f1da7dc6e.tar.gz",
    ]
    PROTOBUF_sha256 = "4a1d4dc12fe2e3621233cfeaf6baf9e47f6e184e1171f7f0c9c126942a22e31b"
    PROTOBUF_strip_prefix = "protobuf-ab09b2a2e203b204e11ac64750e62b3f1da7dc6e"
    PROTOBUF_patch_file = "//tensorflow:protobuf-patch.txt"
```

For eigen patch, same thing. Download the file and add it as a `patch_file=` to the eigen library in workspace.bzl.
